framework.controls.interfaces

Interface Form

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControlsPage

    public interface Form
    This interface allows a user to configure UI controls with functionality to fill in a form with data. Typically this interface would be implemented on a page object.
    Author:
    nvonop

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fillForm(java.lang.String[] args)
      This method enables data to be written into the form.
      java.lang.Object submitForm()
      This method enables the form data to be submitted.

    • Method Detail

      • fillForm

        void fillForm(java.lang.String[] args)
        This method enables data to be written into the form.
        Parameters:
        args - a String[] of data to write into each field within a form

      • submitForm

        java.lang.Object submitForm()
        This method enables the form data to be submitted. Typically this would be by clicking the "Submit" button or similar.
        Returns:
        an Object. This would typically be another page object
